titleStmt.title: The old Protestants letanie: against all sectaries, and their defendants, both Presbyterians, and Independants. / Composed by a lover of God, and King Charles.
titleStmt.author: Alleyn, Thomas.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare of hope, 1647.

notesStmt.note: A lover of God, and King Charles = Thomas Alleyn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
